attributes.action: aid the homeless in rebuilding their lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a fully developed country we have it within our capacity to pro-actively aid the homeless on the streets of our cities. It is therefore our duty, as a nation and as fellow humans, to see that those without hope are given a chance to regain their dignity and rejoin the larger community.

We formally request that greater aid is given to those shelters in helping the homeless help themselves, and also to help in setting up new homeless shelters where they are needed.

We also request tax benefits (if such a system does not already exist) for companies that donate unneeded food, clothes and other needed services in the aid of shelters.
